title: Making Ranked Team Need Two more
body:
Me and some friends are making a ranked team so far we have a support, jungler and ADC

Roles needed:
Top laner
Mid laner

**Required rank:**
Gold +
Current Members
Hubinator7 (gold 3)
Just4mee (diamond 1)
Vchaotiic (Plat 3)

Some Requirements 
Must speak English and play on oceanic server.
Must listen to team leader (Just4mee).
Attend practice when possible.

**About us:**
We are a young group of players around the age 18.
We want to form a team so we can practice and become better players.
We want to get a team so we can vs other small teams to refine our skills.

**Why you should join our team:**
By joining our team you will learn more about the game and strategies within it and have some
fun with the friendly people in your team whilst you become a better player.

**Activities:
**
We will occasionally watch a replay of a game with the team if we loose so that we can see the mistakes we made and
improve on them so that we get better at positioning and decision making so that you can become an overall better player.
We will try our best to find other small teams to do custom 5v5's against so we can improve as a team.

If I don't respond to your post add me in game and message me at anytime my name is Hubinator7.

replies.body: hey man i know and mid and top but im s2 but i try go gold so cadet me (dokimaste me )

Hey fam,

Havent played that much since S3 but getting back into the swing of it and keen to jump into a competitive team.

Currently G4 mid main, was plat 1 in S3.

Champ pool (S6): vel'koz, Kog'maw (AP), malzahar, diana.

(I know its small but just got back into it so i need to get some more games under my belt as most of the champs have changed alot)

Strengths: mechanically strong, teamfight positioning, objective control, low deaths (usually dont die much, and have good awareness and anticipagion of enemy jungle location diring lane phase)

Weaknesses: obviously in depth understanding of current meta/ game. Current champion pool (which i aim to improve regardless).

Not really a weakness but i also mistly play late game scaling champs that for the most part require a dect bit of peel so usually the first 10-12 minutes i am pretty weak comparitive to other champion selections.

Questions for you:

When do you play? 

When do you train?

What do you expect?

Feel free to add me IG: Aspire nothing

Questions for you:

When do you play?
we mostly play in the afternoon around 3pm to 12am depending whats on in real life.

When do you train?
we will be training the afternoons because some people have school.

What do you expect?
we expect you to listen and attend practice when possible so you can improve your skills.
we expect you to not flame anyone else on the ranked team if they make a really noob mistake you can tell them about it after the game to help them improve on it and tell them what they could have done instead.

Hey i am happy to be a sub i am silver 3 but when i was in NA i was plat 4 or 3 cant remember so ye :)
I am a ADC main
sick bro send me an email or message on league when you can and ill add you on skype or whatever
gold 1 top laner, im looking for a ranked team to join, dedicated to improving, and adapting to the meta, add IGN Pixel Panda
D4 sup main, but played alot of top, specially tanks, add IGN abnormalx
